text: Mitar Palikuća (, born 1974 in Šabac) is a Serbian disabled table tennis player. He has won the first medal for Serbia at Summer Paralympics in Rio. ==Notes== Category:1974 births Category:Serbian male table tennis players Category:Table tennis players at the 2016 Summer Paralympics Category:Paralympic table tennis players of Serbia Category:Medalists at the 2016 Summer Paralympics Category:Paralympic medalists in table tennis Category:Paralympic bronze medalists for Serbia Category:Living people
title: Mitar Palikuća
